data.name: Program Announcement Details
data.queryText:
select c.Id as contactId,c.FirstName as contactName,c.Email as contactEmail, c.Mobilephone as phoneNumber,
a.title,a.name,a.announcementId,
a.university, a.department, a.program, a.term, a.userGroup,a.startdate,a.enddate,a.createdDate,
u.Id as userId,acc1.id as departmentid,
concat('https://student.lumen.u-next.com/s/un-announcement/',a.announcementId) as announcementLink,
concat('New',' ',a.recordType,' ','Published') as bellTitle,
concat('A new',' ',a.recordType,' ','has been published','.') as body,
a.recordType as recordType,
case
when a.program is not null then 
concat(a.announcementId, c.Id,a.startDate,a.endDate) end as uniqueId
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/6f4d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/6f4d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as a

join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8eeab222-ee04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8eeab222-ee04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/name}}] as acc
on acc.name = a.program

join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8eeab222-ee04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8eeab222-ee04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/name}}] as acc1
on acc1.id = acc.parentid

join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/c329c7b1-ef04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/c329c7b1-ef04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/name}}] as pe
on pe.hed__account__c = acc.id

join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8f25658f-ec04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8f25658f-ec04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/name}}] as c
on c.Id= pe.hed__Contact__c

join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/aed3e2b6-ec04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/aed3e2b6-ec04-ed11-ba48-f40343d02ec8/data/name}}] as u
on u.Id= c.lumen__User__c

where a.program is not null and a.term is null and a.userGroup is null 
and u.IsActive=1  
and [hed__Enrollment_Status__c]='Active'
and a.endDate > = getUTCDate()
